items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT!
items.body: Really cute! Comfy and great quality. Iâ€™m 5â€™7 138lbs and a small fits perfect. Read more
items.author: Sarah R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, Easy, Cheap
items.body: I was looking for a little black dress to take with me to Vegas and couldn't be happier with this one. It's a little stretchy so I didn't have to worry about not being able to find something in the right size at the last minute. And even though I was running around Vegas, this dress was totally comfy. It's made out of a nice-quality fabric that is definitely NOT breathable, but honestly that's not an issue if you're not somewhere super hot and sweaty (I suggest a winter option for Vegas). I paired it with a leather jacket, black purse, silver chunky jewelry, and combat boots. The whole look ended up being comfortable and cute. It doesn't wrinkle either. You cannot beat this for the price! Definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: T R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommend going one size up
items.body: I usually wear a size X small but had a feeling this would be quite fitted so I purchased it in small, perfect fit. This is a super cute dress for going out, would work for a club or a dinner. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Formal Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Khaki Pink, Fuchsia, Royal Blue, Hot Pink, Light Green, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Deep Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
